head.title: A Bit of This and That: The Net as a Flea Market of Ideas

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet

hedline.hl1: A Bit of This and That: The Net as a Flea Market of Ideas

abstract.p: Roundup of Web sites of interest; map; photos (L)

block.p: CARFREE.COM: www.carfree.com A site dedicated to the proposition of car-free cities.
CORN CAM: www.iowafarmer.com/corncam/corn.html If you film it, they will come: watch corn grow.
CARFREE.COM: www.carfree.com A site dedicated to the proposition of car-free cities.
CORN CAM: www.iowafarmer.com/corncam/corn.html If you film it, they will come: watch corn grow.
EMPIRE STATE BUILDING LIGHTING SCHEDULE: www .esbnyc.com/html/facts.html What the colors signify at the world's most famous skyscraper.
FARMERS' MARKETS: www.ams.usda.gov/farmersmarkets /map.htm Find farmers' markets nationwide.
JUST WINDMILLS: www.geocities.com/Yosemite/1001 /windmill.htm A tribute to windmills.
NEW YORK CITY DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH RESTAURANT INSPECTION INFORMATION: www.nyclink.org/html/doh /html/rii/index.html Would you like vermin with that? Results of New York restaurant inspections.
SUBWAY NAVIGATOR: www.subwaynavigator.com/bin /cities/english Descriptions and maps for any journey along the subway systems of more than 60 cities.
YUMMIE: yummie.s-one.net.sg/Links.htm A guide to the best places to eat in Singapore, and recipes.
25 MOST INTERESTING WEBCAMS: www.earthcam.com /top25
Links to many Web cams, including the Kremlin, NASA, and the White Mana Diner in Jersey City.
Reference and Tools
555-1212.COM: www.555-1212.com Area codes.
ANAGRAM FUN: www.anagramfun.com ''Personal Web site'' becomes ''we bar politeness.''
BEAUCOUP: www.beaucoup.com/1refeng.html Links to more than 2,000 online reference sites.
THE BELLS APPLET: www.cs.ubc.ca/spider/kvdoel/bells /bells.html Do your own change ringing, traditional English church bell patterns.
BIOGRAPHICAL DICTIONARY: www.s9.com/biography /search.html
More than 28,000 notable people.
THE DIALECTIZER: www.rinkworks.com/dialect Translations into redneck, pig latin and hacker.
HOME PRICE CHECK: fool.homepricecheck.com/top.html Find out what your neighbors' houses cost.
INTERNET WEATHER SOURCE: weather.noaa.gov/weather /current/KBID.html Real-time weather data.
THE LIBRARY OF CONGRESS ONLINE CATALOG: catalog.loc .gov Search the country's library.
THE NEW YORK PUBLIC LIBRARY: www.nypl.org/catalogs /catalogs.html Search library catalogs and, with a library card number, free databases as well.
OFFICE OF THE NEW YORK STATE COMPTROLLER: www.osc.state.ny.us/ouf Find out if New York state owes you money.
OFFICIAL UNITED STATES TIME: www.time.gov Choose a state from an online map, then synchronize your watch.
THE THOUGHT FOR TODAY QUOTATION ARCHIVE: webpages .ainet.com/gosner/quotationsarch Wit and brevity (except in the American Presidents section).
THE UNIVERSAL CURRENCY CONVERTER: www.xe.net/ucc Conversions for dozens of world currencies.
YIDDISH IN AMERICA: www.koshernosh.com/in-ameri.htm Yiddish words, not just for the nebbish.
Sports
BALLPARKS: www.ballparks.com/baseball/index.htm Facts and seating charts for every major league baseball park.
CANOEING AND KAYAKING INFO: www.paddling.net For the paddling enthusiast, Product reviews, trip ideas and essays on techniques.
COOL KI TRICKS: www.bodymindandmodem.com/CoolKi /CoolKi.html Akido tricks that you can learn to fool your friends into thinking you are tougher than you really are.
DOG AGILITY PAGE: www.dogpatch.org/agility Everything about the sport of agility training for dogs. See if Rover has what it takes.
DUKE BASKETBALL REPORT: www.dukebasketballreport .com Daily updates from the Blue Devils.
JIGSAW PUZZLES: A BRIEF HISTORY: www.mgcpuzzles.com /mgcpuzzles/puzzlehistory/index.htm Jigsaw history.
NADIACOMANECI.COM: www.nadiacomaneci.com A fan site dedicated to Nadia Comaneci.
PAINTED WARRIOR'S DESIGNS: users.aol.com/maskman30 /gallery.html A fan's gallery dedicated to the fallen art of hockey goalie mask art. Ah, an early Cheevers.
RIVALS: www.rivals.com
Local sports coverage from hundreds of sources.
ROWING FAQ: www.ruf.rice.edu/crew/rowingfaq.html A sweep? A skull? All about rowing.
STAGE FRONT SEATING CHARTS: www.stagefronttickets .com/Seating
BROWSER
